bike.description: Specialized FACT 9r N'Aero tube shaping, triple monocoque construction, compact aero geometry, vertical seat adjustment, OS BB

components.description: Specialized FACT N'Aero carbon, monocoque construction, 1" steerer
S-Works 1" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge ceramic bearings w/ stainless steel races, conical cover w/ two 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
S-Works Pro-Set, 3D forged, carbon/alloy face plate w/ Ti bolts, carbon top cap, 4-position adjustable
S-Works FACT carbon, integrated oversize design
S-Works Transition carbon, forward and setback posts, 2 position
Chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
